This page includes links to news articles and, soon, scholarly articles that use data posted by the Deportation Data Project to illustrate how the data can be used by journalists and scholars.

## News articles and blog posts

- [ICE Arrests Have Risen Sharply in Every State Since Trump. Here are the numbers.](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2025/06/27/us/ice-arrests-trump.html), by Albert Sun, *New York Times*, June 27, 2025.

- [The End of Narciso's American Dream: the Brutal Arrest of a Mexican Gardener Shocks Santa Ana](https://english.elpais.com/usa/2025-06-27/the-end-of-narcisos-american-dream-the-brutal-arrest-of-a-mexican-gardener-shocks-santa-ana.html), by Luis Pablo Beauregard, *El País*, June 27, 2025.

- [New Data Shows That Over Half of Those Detained by ICE in Los Angeles Have No Criminal History](https://lamag.com/news/new-data-shows-that-over-half-of-those-detained-by-ice-in-los-angeles-have-no-criminal-history), by Ava Mitchell, *Los Angeles Magazine*, June 27, 2025.
